title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library that wraps the Ollama REST API for chat, generate, pull, and embed endpoints.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: PyPI package adding Ollama chat and embedding interfaces to LangChain LLM and retriever components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that offers ChatGPT-like experience for any local Ollama model.

title: ollama-hass
summary: Home-Assistant custom integration exposing Ollama models as conversation agents and automation services.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin library providing fluent builders for chat, generate, pull, and embed calls against Ollama.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem wrapping the Ollama HTTP API with ActiveModel-style interfaces and streaming support.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Enhanced interactive CLI frontend written in Python that adds readline history, syntax highlighting, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot.vim
summary: Experimental fork replacing GitHub Copilot backend with a local Ollama model for Vim/Neovim code completion.

title: ollama-copilot.nvim
summary: Neovim Lua plugin turning Ollama into a Copilot-style code assistant with inline completions and chat panel.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams Ollama model responses into guild channels with slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart deploying Ollama server and models onto Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up ephemeral Ollama containers in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform provider for provisioning Ollama servers on AWS EC2, GCP Compute, and Azure VMs with GPU support.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + ChromaDB + Streamlit to chat over private PDFs.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command and threaded replies powered by local models.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server letting any MCP client (Claude Desktop, Sourcegraph) call Ollama models.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK published on NuGet for integrating Ollama into C# applications.

title: ollama-go
summary: Idiomatic Go client library with context-based cancellation and native Go struct unmarshaling.
